page.title: 14RECREATION IN ROSSENDALE
page.content: Whittaker Park is the largest park in Rawtenstall it has three tennis courts,a bowling green and also a childrens playground.The{Astoria}is a place where disco's and shows commence.It is situated in the centre of Rawtenstall town centre.Marl Pits is a swimming pool with a few other sports.It's approximate number of people a year is 220,000 people.The 'Sprintman' is a squash and {countryclub.}It is quite new and very popular as it's roll number is 500 people. The{Athletics}Club is at Marl Pits swimming pool.It's accesories include running,high jump and lots more.It's approxomate number of members is 100.Rawtenstall Cricket Club is on Bacup Road and it has it's own team there are 900 members.Whittaker Park{museum}is very interesting and quite popular.
